breeders.title: Our Expert Breeders
breeders.subtitle: Meet the passionate professionals behind our exceptional cats. Our network of certified breeders represents decades of experience in feline genetics and care.
breeders.philosophyText: We partner exclusively with ethical breeders who prioritize health, temperament, and breed standards above all else. Each breeder in our network has been carefully vetted for their commitment to excellence and adherence to the highest standards of animal welfare.

ethical.title: Ethical Practices
ethical.description: Commitment to humane breeding methods with a focus on cat welfare and health

champion.title: Champion Lines
champion.description: Specialization in cats from award-winning show lines with documented pedigrees

local.title: Local Expertise
local.description: Strategically located breeders ensuring easy access and ongoing support

breeders.qualityIntro: Our breeders maintain the highest standards of excellence

health.title: Health Testing
health.description: Comprehensive genetic and health screening for all breeding cats

environment.title: Nurturing Environment
environment.description: Spacious, clean facilities designed for cat comfort and socialization

support.title: Lifetime Support
support.description: Ongoing guidance and support throughout your cat's life

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Complete documentation and open communication about breeding practices

breeders.ctaTitle: Ready to Meet Your Perfect Companion?
breeders.ctaText: Contact us today to learn more about our available cats and schedule a visit with one of our expert breeders.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.errorCurrent: Incorrect current password. Please try again.
changePassword.errorMismatch: New passwords don't match. Please try again.

contact.loginRequired: Please login to send a message
